column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Holy Mother Pizza... BEST PIZZA I'VE EVER HAD IN MY ENTIRE LIFE!!!!!! Â My cousin (local foodie) brought me here. OMFG!!!! I NEVER WANT TO EAT ANYTHING ELSE EXCEPT LOU'S deep dish pizzas! If you're ever in Chi-Town go to a Lou's
column2: it will change your mind on eating Dominos
